body:
OK, perhaps we should separate gomobile bind from gomobile (use build tag?)
so that users of Go 1.4 can build gomobile, but won't have the gobind
functionality.

gomobile init should rebuild itslef after building Go 1.5.

Alternatively, just document that gomobile requires Go 1.5, and if you
don't know
how to install Go 1.5 now, just wait for 3 months for the official release.
